introduction: SYNOPSISSung-tae is able to graduate from med school with the aid of his girlfriend Jin-sook and he begins working as a neurosurgeon at the hospital she works at. They promise to marry and she even becomes pregnant. But when he meets the hospital director's daughter Jung-ah, he decides to eliminate Jin-sook who stands in the way of his success. He poisons her and dumps her paralyzed body in the pond behind the hospital. From then on, the spirit of Jin-sook haunts him every night. The police begin to investigate her death for possible foul play and although he reconfirms her death, he is haunted by her every night. He soon discovers that the apparition of Jin-sook was orchestrated by her aunt who wants to take revenge for her niece. Sung-tae's dreams and aspirations become nothing overnight.故事在金淑的帮助下完成医学院学业后，成泰在她的护士医院当护士。他们答应结婚，金淑甚至怀孕。不过，与医院院长女儿郑东见面的宋泰，为了成功，决定摆脱这个问题。最后，她把她瘫痪成毒，把她杀死在医院后面的池塘里。从此以后，宋泰晚上忍受金石的鬼魂，并查看金苏在警方的痕迹。成泰在医学判断中重申了金洙的死亡，但金洙的幽灵仍然出现。宋泰惊奇地发现，金淑的祖先护理助手正试图解决她的问题。最终，宋泰的梦想和野心都被浪费了。
